name: AppcircleTestingDistribution
description: Efficiently distribute application builds to users or testing groups using Appcircle's robust platform.
author: appcircle

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: Appcircle Personal API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Appcircle Personal API Token to authenticate connections to Appcircle services. This token allows your Azure DevOps pipeline to interact with Appcircle for distributing applications.

inputs.name: profileId
inputs.label: Profile Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the Appcircle distribution profile. This ID uniquely identifies the profile under which your applications will be distributed.

inputs.name: appPath
inputs.label: App Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to your application file. For iOS, this can be a .ipa or .xcarchive file path. For Android, specify the .apk or .appbundle file path.

inputs.name: message
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional message to include with the distribution to provide additional information to testers or users receiving the build.
